com.camerontec.catalys.util.fast.codec

Class FastCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.fast.codec.FastCodec

  • public class FastCodec
extends Object
    The encoding and decoding are performed by four classes - this class, the CODEC, and a serializer/deserializer, the SERDES and the FastInputStream (decoding) or FastOuputStream (encoding).

    The SERDES performs encoding/decoding simply given a value and an indication of whether or not it is the value of an optional field. It does not know anything about the presence map.

    The CODEC manages the operators and updates an existing presence map supplied to it.

    The FastInputStream and FastOutputStream manage the presence map.

    • Method Detail

      • isGroupPresent

        public boolean isGroupPresent(boolean optional,
                              PmapContext pmapContext)
        Checks whether group is present.

        For optional groups, we need to check the PMAP. Mandatory groups are always present.

        Parameters:
        optional - True if group is optional
        pmapContext - PmapContext
        Returns:
        True if group is not present.

      • decodePmap

        public int decodePmap(PmapContext pmapContext)
               throws IOException
        This will decode the PMap into the given PmapContext.
        Parameters:
        pmapContext - Receives decoded PMAP.
        Returns:
        size of PMAP
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a problem reading the bit map.

      • decodeValue

        public IValue decodeValue(IField templateField,
                          PmapContext pmapContext,
                          IValue target)
                   throws FastCodecException
        Note that the value object instance returned by this method is reused on subsequent calls (to minimize unnecessary object creation). Therefore its contents should be copied by the receiving code, rather than just storing a reference to the object.
        Parameters:
        templateField - Definition of next value to be decoded from input stream.
        pmapContext - Current PMAP context.
        target - Value which should receive decoded data.
        Returns:
        Returns target.
        Throws:
        FastCodecException - If there is a problem decoding a value.

      • decodeValue

        public IValue decodeValue(IField templateField,
                          PmapContext pmapContext)
                   throws FastCodecException
        Equivalent to decodeValue( templateField, pmapContext, new StandardValue());

        Convenient for testing but normally you would not want to create a new value object for decodeValue call.

        Parameters:
        templateField - Definition of next value to be decoded from input stream.
        pmapContext - Current PMAP context.
        Returns:
        Returns decoded value in newly created object.
        Throws:
        FastCodecException - If there is a problem decoding a value.
        See Also:
        decodeValue(IField, PmapContext, IValue)

      • updatePmapForGroup

        public void updatePmapForGroup(boolean optional,
                               boolean present,
                               PmapContext pmapContext)
                        throws FastCodecException
        "If a group field is optional, it will occupy a single bit in the presence map. The contents of the group may appear in the stream iff the bit is set."
        Parameters:
        optional - True if this group is optional.
        present - Indicates whether or not any group fields were encoded.
        pmapContext - Current PMAP context
        Throws:
        FastCodecException - If there is a problem.

      • updatePmapForEndSegment

        public void updatePmapForEndSegment(PmapContext pmapContext)
                             throws FastCodecException
        Trims PMAP down to remove trailing zero bytes and sets the stop bit on the last byte.
        Parameters:
        pmapContext - Current PMAP context
        Throws:
        FastCodecException - If there is a problem.
